<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="home default">2b5f9dc797432110a714bbe3a253af87</macroponent><name>stylized_text_4/text</name><preset/><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**

// function padTo2Digits(num) {

function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
var starttimestamp=api.data.tltransform_1.output[0].events[0].timestamp;


  var dateFormat=new Date(starttimestamp);
  var month=String((dateFormat.getMonth()+1));
  var day=String(dateFormat.getDate());
  var hours=String(dateFormat.getHours());
  var minutes=String(dateFormat.getMinutes());
  var seconds=String(dateFormat.getSeconds());
if (month.length< 2) 
        month = '0' + month;
    if (day.length < 2) 
        day = '0' + day;
    if(hours.length<2)
      hours='0'+hours;
    if(minutes.length<2)
      minutes='0'+minutes;
    if(seconds.length<2)
      seconds='0'+seconds;
var str= dateFormat.getFullYear()+"-"+  
        month+"-"+
        day+" "+
           hours+":"+
           minutes+":"+
           seconds;

return str;

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-06-03 13:05:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>123f924897572110a714bbe3a253af19</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>stylized_text_4/text</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_123f924897572110a714bbe3a253af19</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-06-03 13:05:05</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
